actions.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 108-29.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 9.
Mr. Burgess moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.

references.type: text of measure as reported in House

actions.text: Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 19.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.
On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 406 - 0, 8 Present (Roll no. 52).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Designating the room numbered H-236 in the House of Representatives wing of the Capitol as the "Richard K. Armey Room".

summary.text: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on January 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates the room numbered H-236 in the House of Representatives wing of the Capitol as the "Richard K. Armey Room."
